#!/bin/bash
function updatepk() { if [ ! -z $1 ]; then if [ -e /var/run/yum.pid ];then exit 10 fi result=`yum -y update $1 2>&1` status=$? commandexist=`echo $result | grep -E "yum: command not found"` if [ "$commandexist" != "" ]; then exit 8 fi
commandexist=`echo $result | grep -E "yum: No such file or directory"` if [ "$commandexist" != "" ]; then exit 8 fi
islock=`echo $result | grep -E "lock /var/run/yum.pid"`
if [ "$islock" != "" ]; then exit 10 fi
islock=`echo $result | grep -E "/var/run/yum.pid: another copy is running"`
if [ "$islock" != "" ]; then exit 10 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "There was an error communicating with RHN"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "This system is not registered with RHN"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "No Repositories Available to Set Up"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "Error Class Code: 9 Error Class Info: Invalid System Credentials"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi isscriptletfailed=`echo $result | grep -E "error:" | grep -E "scriptlet failed, exit status 255"` if [ "$isscriptletfailed" != "" ]; then exit 6 fi if [ $status -ne 0 ];then exit 7 fi fi } updatepk vinagre
exit 0

Vulnerability.Title: vinagre bug fix and enhancement update
Vulnerability.Description: The vinagre packages provide the Vinagre remote desktop viewer for the GNOME desktop. This update fixes the following bugs: When the user pressed the "Help" button in the "Connect" dialog, the "Connect" dialog was closed and the "Help" window was shown instead. This behavior could be inconvenient because the user had to open the "Connect" dialog again. With this update, "Help" is opened in a separate window. (BZ#1068615) When an error occurred, the Vinagre viewer showed an error dialog with a general title instead of the one with a title specific to the error. The underlying source code has been modified, and Vinagre now shows error dialogs with titles specific to errors. (BZ#1141150) When connecting to a remote machine with a recent Windows system, the Vinagre viewer did not offer the user an authentication dialog or a certificate verification dialog. As a consequence, the user was unable to connect to the remote machine. With this update, Vinagre shows the aforementioned dialogs so that the user is able to connect to the remote machine as expected. (BZ#1091765, BZ#1142870) In addition, this update adds the following enhancement: The Vinagre viewer now allows the user to specify the size of the remote screen when opening a connection to a remote machine using the Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP). (BZ#862389) Users of vinagre are advised to upgrade to these updated packages, which fix these bugs and add this enhancement. Note for remediation: Please disable the SELinux for RHEL 4/5 when repairing, or some rpm packages will fail to install.
